attributes.action: Get a refund for the 2012 Olympics logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
£400,000 for a logo that looks like the work of a primary school student (and that's probably an insult to a lot of primary school students) is excessive.

The logo should be replaced with an entry from the BBCs "readers logos" some of which are far better, or with the original logo from the bid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
